verse: 1 The Prophet exhorteth all people to the worship of the true and everlasting God, commending the mercy of God toward the posterity of Jacob.â€ƒ9 And after prophesieth of the kingdom of Christ in the time of the Gospel.
All people clap your hands; sing loud unto God with a joyful voice.
For the Lord is high, and terrible; a great King over all the earth.
He hath subdued the people under us, and the nations under our feet.
He hath chosen our inheritance for us: even the glory of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.
God is gone up with triumph, even the Lord with the sound of the trumpet.
Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.
For God is the king of all the earth: sing praises everyone that hath understanding.
God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon his holy Throne.
The princes of the people are gathered unto the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the world belong to God: he is greatly to be exalted.
